snippet: Michael B. Oren, Israel's ambassador to the United States, denied characterizing Republican policies as harmful to Israel, rebutting a comment by Debbie Wasserman Schultz, chairwoman of the Democratic National Committee.
abstract: Michael B. Oren, Israel's ambassador to the United States, denied characterizing Republican policies as harmful to Israel, rebutting a comment by Debbie Wasserman Schultz, chairwoman of the Democratic National Committee.

headline.main: Wasserman Schultz Comments Draw Denial from Israeli Ambassador
